mapper.sql: id, evaluatCaseId, key, name, cntImg, createDate
mapper.update: update evaluat_case_sub set evaluatCaseId = #{evaluatCaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, key = #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cntImg = #{cntImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
